enhanced_description: NamanHR is a strategic management-consulting firm specializing in tackling diverse HR and management challenges. As fast-growing people and culture consultants with offices across India and a global client base of 600+ organizations, their expertise spans end-to-end HR consulting services. These services include training, OD interventions, organizational design, compensation benchmarking, performance management, talent management, HR system design, psychometric services, and recruitment. NamanHR focuses on organization development, talent development, and establishing HR systems based on global best practices, aiming to enhance business performance and potential, transform employee performance, and boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
